description: Another one of http://anidb.net/ch6556 [Ayumi]`s friends, Koyoi has an open brother complex with her brother http://anidb.net/ch6571 [Yoshihiko]. Once http://anidb.net/ch6565 [Misao] starts hanging around, she, along with http://anidb.net/ch6560 [Nao], stop walking home with Ayumi. She is also in the same grade as Ayumi. Since her brother likes http://anidb.net/ch6567 [Misaki], a popular and attractive girl, she regards her as a "Final Boss" that she must defeat. She also quotes that Misaki`s chest is a "truly evil power."
name: Bessho Koyoi
